dialogue: user: check the weather for the 7 day forecast[NEWLINE]agent: What city are you interested in?[NEWLINE]user: Los Angeles, please. Will it be hot?[NEWLINE]agent: It will be hot today in Los Angeles.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Yes, can you give me the information on the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel?[NEWLINE]agent: Absolutely. It is an expensive hotel located in the west part of town. It has 4 starts and includes free wifi and parking. Would you like help booking a room?[NEWLINE]user: Yes please, I need a reservation for 6 people for 5 nights starting on Saturday.[NEWLINE]agent: Sorry, there are not enough rooms available for that time period. Perhaps a different day or a shorter stay might yield better results.[NEWLINE]user: How about for 1 night? If that works, I'll need a reference number of course.[NEWLINE]agent: Booking was successful. Your reference number is : OO8QDA62.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need a train from London Kings Cross to Cambridge.[NEWLINE]agent: I have 70 trains travelling that route. To narrow it down, what day would you like to leave and what time would you like to depart/arrive?[NEWLINE]user: sure, I would like to go on Saturday, and arrive by 20:20. As close to that time as I can arrive.[NEWLINE]agent: I have a 19:17 from London that arrives at 20:08. Would that work for you?[NEWLINE]user: Yes, let me have 7 tickets, please.[NEWLINE]agent: Booking was successful, the total fee is 132.16 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is : QMD5P3EG. Is there anything else I can help you with?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need to find a shopping center.[NEWLINE]agent: The Stanford Shopping Center at 773 Alger Dr is 3 miles away in no traffic. Would you like directions there?[NEWLINE]user: Yes please.[NEWLINE]agent: I sent all the info on the screen, please drive carefully![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Schedule meeting.[NEWLINE]agent: What details shall I add to your meeting reminder?[NEWLINE]user: Please set it for the 13th at 11am. It is going to be with management and to discuss our company picnic. Thank you.

user: Can you help me find a restaurant that serves greek food and is expensive?[NEWLINE]agent: I apologize but there are no expensive greek restaurants listed, would you like to try a different food type or price range?[NEWLINE]user: Do you have any Indian restaurants?[NEWLINE]agent: We have 14 indian restaurants in the expensive category. Do you have any more information to narrow down the search?[NEWLINE]user: I do not. Is there one you can recommend?[NEWLINE]agent: I can recommend one for you, but first is there a particular part of town you would like to travel too?[NEWLINE]user: Any part of town is fine, I just need the address and postcode of one you'd recommend.[NEWLINE]agent: I would recommend the Maharajah Tandoori Restaurant. It's in the west end. The address is 41518 Castle Street City Centre. The postcode is cb30ah. Shall I make a booking?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Car I need to get at my friends house near my current location, please send me their address on the screen[NEWLINE]agent: Tom lives at 580 Van Ness Ave.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: looking for a place to dine. The restaurant should serve british food and should be in the expensive price range.[NEWLINE]agent: Fitzbillies restaurant at 51 Trumpington Street City Centre fits your request. Would you like me to book a table for you?[NEWLINE]user: I would. It's a party of 6 for Monday at 15:45. Can I get the reference number when you're done?[NEWLINE]agent: Your reservation has been made. The reference number is GK4F8AFS. Is there anything else I can help you with?[NEWLINE]user: No, that's everything. Thanks for your help.[NEWLINE]agent: welcome next time[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Im looking for a shopping mall around here.[NEWLINE]agent: The Topanga mall is 4 miles away.[NEWLINE]user: What is the address?[NEWLINE]agent: The address to Topanga mall is 171 Oak Rd.[NEWLINE]user: Set GPS for the quickest route to get there.[NEWLINE]agent: GPS set for quickest route to Topanga Mall.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Is there rain on Sunday[NEWLINE]agent: What city would you like the forecast for?[NEWLINE]user: Compton.

user: Schedule a meeting today at 9 am with management to discuss the company picnic.[NEWLINE]agent: Setting reminder for meeting with management to discuss company picnic for today at 9 am.[NEWLINE]user: Thanks![NEWLINE]agent: You are welcome.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: what will the weather be like in the city[NEWLINE]agent: What city do you want the weather for?[NEWLINE]user: The 7 day for Fresno please.[NEWLINE]agent: In Fresno, it will be misty Monday foggy Tuesday, humid Wednesday, drizzle Thursday, clear Friday, hail Saturday and be windy Sunday.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I'm looking for a train departing from ely.[NEWLINE]agent: On what day do you wish to travel and to what destination?[NEWLINE]user: I'd like to travel to Cambridge on Wednesday, but I don't want to leave before noon.[NEWLINE]agent: I have a train to Cambridge leaving Ely at 13:35. Will this work for you?[NEWLINE]user: That should work. I need booking for 2 people and I will need the reference number, please.[NEWLINE]agent: I have booked two spots for you. The reference number is IU3F4FKV[NEWLINE]user: Wonderful. Thank you.[NEWLINE]agent: You're welcome. Is there anything else you may need?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Good evening. Can you help me find a guesthouse to stay at for the weekend?[NEWLINE]agent: acorn guest house is in the north part of town and available, when would you like to stay?[NEWLINE]user: Does it have free WiFi?[NEWLINE]agent: Yes, it does! It also has free parking.[NEWLINE]user: Could I get the phone number for them.[NEWLINE]agent: Phone number is 01223353888.[NEWLINE]user: Thanks. Oh, I forgot to ask, is that in the moderate price range?[NEWLINE]agent: The Acorn guesthouse is in the moderate range. Would you like to book a room?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: what is the temperature outside[NEWLINE]agent: Where are you located?[NEWLINE]user: What is the temperature in Camarillo right now?

user: I need a taxi to come after 19:30.[NEWLINE]agent: Where would you like to be picked up from?[NEWLINE]user: I am in wandlebury country park.[NEWLINE]agent: Where will you be going to?[NEWLINE]user: I'll be going to meze bar restaurant.[NEWLINE]agent: You are booked on a red lexus.[NEWLINE]user: Great. Can I get a contact number?[NEWLINE]agent: Yes, your contact number is 07236149315. Do you need other bookings?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Where is the nearest hospital?[NEWLINE]agent: Stanford Childrens Health is the only hospital I can find. It is located at 899 Ames Ct which is 6 miles away, but there is a road block near it.[NEWLINE]user: Oh no I have to get there, what's the address?[NEWLINE]agent: The address is 899 Ames Ct, I sent the best route on your screen[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I'm looking for a restaurant in the south that serves international food.[NEWLINE]agent: Unfortunately, I was unable to find a restaurant in the south that serves international cuisine. Is there another type of cuisine that would interest you?[NEWLINE]user: No, I really need a restaurant in the south that serves international food.[NEWLINE]agent: There is international food in the east and centre of town. The south has many cuisines but no international food.[NEWLINE]user: Are there any restaurants in the south that serve Indian food?[NEWLINE]agent: Taj tandoori is a Indian place that is in the south. The number is 01223412299.[NEWLINE]user: Will you please book a table for 4 people at 16:15 on wednesday?[NEWLINE]agent: Unfortunately, the time and day you've chosen is unavailable. Would you like to book a different time or day?[NEWLINE]user: We can go earlier. How about 15:15, please?[NEWLINE]agent: Booking was successful for 15:15. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Your reference number is XQA73LQL. Anything else?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I am looking for a train to Cambridge.[NEWLINE]agent: When will you be travelling?[NEWLINE]user: I'll be leaving Friday after 20:45.[NEWLINE]agent: I have several options for you depending on your departure site. Where will you be leaving from?[NEWLINE]user: I need to depart from Cabridge and go to Bishops Stortford.[NEWLINE]agent: There are few options to choose from. How many people are traveling?[NEWLINE]user: I will have 2 people traveling.[NEWLINE]agent: Okay, would you like me to book TR4664?[NEWLINE]user: Yes, please. I need the reference number.[NEWLINE]agent: The reference number is 0JI02QOT. Can I help you with anything else?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Can you give me the price for a large pizza and what type of pizzas they offer at Pizza Express fen ditton please[NEWLINE]agent: Would you like to book a reservation at Pizza Express?[NEWLINE]user: What is the price range of Pizza Express?[NEWLINE]agent: Pizza Express Fen Ditton is in the moderate price range.[NEWLINE]user: What is the food type at Pizza Express?[NEWLINE]agent: It is italian food.[NEWLINE]user: Okay, thank you.

user: I need a taxi to take me to yippee noodle bar by 9:45[NEWLINE]agent: Absolutely, where will the taxi be picking you up from today?[NEWLINE]user: The Rajmahal please[NEWLINE]agent: All right, a blue skoda will come for you. Should you need to contact them, the number is 07714291108.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Can you find me the closest hospital to me?[NEWLINE]agent: The closest hospital, Stanford Express Care is 8 miles from your location[NEWLINE]user: How's the traffic?[NEWLINE]agent: There is a car collision nearby.[NEWLINE]user: Can we avoid the collision?[NEWLINE]agent: Yes, I can help you avoid the collision.[NEWLINE]user: Great, please give me the address and details via the quickest route.[NEWLINE]agent: The address is 214 El Camino Real, I highlighted it on your map together with the quickest route[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: is it going to rain sometime this week[NEWLINE]agent: What city are you inquiring about?[NEWLINE]user: Redwood City, please.[NEWLINE]agent: It will drizzle on Wednesday and Thursday in Redwood City.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I'm hurt and I need the nearest hospital.[NEWLINE]agent: The nearest hospital is Addenbrookes Hospital.[NEWLINE]user: Can I get the address and phone number?[NEWLINE]agent: I'm just going to call an ambulance.[NEWLINE]user: No thank you, just give me the address, postcode, and phone number please.[NEWLINE]agent: Addesbrookes Hospital is located on Hills Rd with the postcode CB20QQ. The direct phone number for the emergency department is 01223217118. Are you sure I can't book you an ambulance?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Will it be humid in San Jose next week?

user: Hi, I'm looking for an expensive restaurant.[NEWLINE]agent: Okay, we have 57 restaurants in that price range. Are you looking for a place in a certain part of town?[NEWLINE]user: I'd like something in the centre if possible.[NEWLINE]agent: Most of the expensive restaurants in Cambridge happen to be in the center of town! Would you like to try some British food at Fitzbillies?[NEWLINE]user: That sounds nice! Can I just get their phone number, address, and postcode?[NEWLINE]agent: The address is 51 Trumpington Street City Centre, the phone number is 01223352500, and the postcode is cb21rg. Is there anything else I can help you with today?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Can you book me a taxi to riverside brasserie?[NEWLINE]agent: Sure! Where are you coming from?[NEWLINE]user: I will be leaving the good luck chinese food takeaway.[NEWLINE]agent: Ok, what time would you like to leave by?[NEWLINE]user: I actually need to arrive by 12:45[NEWLINE]agent: Your booking is completed, a grey honda will be picking you up. The contact number is 07290151077.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: What will the high temperature be for Los Angeles?[NEWLINE]agent: Today there is going to be frost in Los Angeles. Would you like to know about some other day?[NEWLINE]user: What will the highest temperature be on Monday?[NEWLINE]agent: The high in Los Angeles will be 50F on Monday.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Could you please get me a train?[NEWLINE]agent: Sure I can help you find a train. Where are you needing to go and where are you coming from? What time do you need to leave by?[NEWLINE]user: I am leaving Leicester and I need to leave by 20:30.[NEWLINE]agent: What is your destination and day of travel?[NEWLINE]user: Cambridge and on friday. Can I just get the travel time for the train? Thanks![NEWLINE]agent: The first train leaving after 20:30 is 21:09 and the travel time is 105 minutes.[NEWLINE]user: That sounds perfect, thank you for your help.[NEWLINE]agent: Would you like me to book it for you?[NEWLINE]user: No, that's OK, I'll get my tickets at the station. I just needed information.[NEWLINE]agent: Can I assist you with anything else today?[NEWLINE]user: No, that's all. Thanks.[NEWLINE]agent: I'm sorry, I think I misunderstood you. You want to leave before 20:30. You should book TR2602, leaving at 20:09. Travel time is 105 minutes.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Hi I need a taxi to jesus green outdoor pool, but I can't leave until after 18:30. Can you help?[NEWLINE]agent: I'd be happy to help! Where are you coming from?[NEWLINE]user: I will be leaving from the Fitzbillies restaurant.[NEWLINE]agent: I have confirmed your taxi, a blue tesla will be picking you up at 18:30.[NEWLINE]user: Awesome. Can I have the contact number?

user: I am looking for a guesthouse to stay in over the weekend. I don't need internet or free parking.[NEWLINE]agent: How about the Avalon?[NEWLINE]user: The Avalon sounds good. What is the address?[NEWLINE]agent: The Avalon is located at 62 Gilbert Road, CB43PD. Would you like me to book this for you?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need a taxi to go to cambridge punter.[NEWLINE]agent: I can help you with that, where are you departing from?[NEWLINE]user: I'm leaving from addenbrookes hospital.[NEWLINE]agent: What time would you like to leave addenbrookes hospital?[NEWLINE]user: I want to leave the hospital after 08:15, please.[NEWLINE]agent: Your taxi is booked. Look for a blue Toyota.[NEWLINE]user: What is the contact number for the blue Toyota?[NEWLINE]agent: The contact number is 07738411271. Is there anything else we can help you with?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need to book a train for 8:45 to go to london kings crossing.[NEWLINE]agent: What day are you planning to travel?[NEWLINE]user: I would like to travel on Friday.[NEWLINE]agent: I'm sorry I dont' have any trains for that day. Would you like to leave at a different time?[NEWLINE]user: I will be leaving from Cambridge on Friday.[NEWLINE]agent: The earliest train I have is at 09:00. Is that ok?[NEWLINE]user: That's fine. Can you give me the arrival time, travel time, and train ID please?[NEWLINE]agent: TR2000 takes 51 minutes to arrive at by 9:51. Would you like me to reserve this for you?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Will it be hail in Cleveland on Sunday?[NEWLINE]agent: There will not be hail in Cleveland on Sunday.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should have a star of 2 and should be in the moderate price range[NEWLINE]agent: There are two such hotels in the north area. The first is the ashley hotel and the second is the lovell lodge. Do you have a preference?[NEWLINE]user: I don't have a preference, actually. Which one do you recommend?[NEWLINE]agent: They both have internet and parking, so it is really up to you.[NEWLINE]user: I choose the ashley hotel. What is their address, please?[NEWLINE]agent: The number for the Ashley Hotel is 01223350059. Can I book that for you?[NEWLINE]user: No, I just need the address.

user: does the forecast say it will snow[NEWLINE]agent: What city do you want to know the forecast for?[NEWLINE]user: Will it snow in Seattle today?[NEWLINE]agent: It will not snow in Seattle today.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I am looking for a mexican restaurant in the centre.[NEWLINE]agent: I'm sorry, there aren't any Mexican restaurants in the centre of town. Would you like to try a different cuisine?[NEWLINE]user: How about an Indian restaurant then?[NEWLINE]agent: There is the curry garden which serves indian food in the centre. Would you like to make a booking?[NEWLINE]user: Oh, no, but I do need the postcode address and number.[NEWLINE]agent: Curry Garden's phone number is 01223302330. They are located at 106 Regent Street City Centre. The postcode is cb21dp. Would you like me to book you a table?[NEWLINE]user: No really, I don't need a booking.[NEWLINE]agent: No problem. Is there anything else I can help you with today?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need to schedule a taxi to da vinci pizzeria from tandoori palace.[NEWLINE]agent: Ok, what time do you want to leave by?[NEWLINE]user: I would like to leave after 22:15.[NEWLINE]agent: Booking completed! A blue volvo will be picking you up, the Contact number is: 07185148788.[NEWLINE]user: Ok thank you![NEWLINE]agent: You're welcome, do you need any further assistance?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I would like to try saigon city.[NEWLINE]agent: Great choice. When can I make the reservation for?[NEWLINE]user: 5 people on a Wednesday at 19:45.[NEWLINE]agent: You got it. Here is your reference number: P9D58C0O.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Will it be misty in Redwood City during the upcoming seven day period?

user: Hi, can you help me find a guesthouse? I need free parking.[NEWLINE]agent: I found 21 results. What side of town would you like?[NEWLINE]user: I would prefer the north side of town please.[NEWLINE]agent: There are quite a lot of them in that area. Do you have a price range in mind, or a particular star rating you'd like me to look for?[NEWLINE]user: Not really. I just need a hotel that can accommodate 6 people for 5 nights, starting Sunday.[NEWLINE]agent: Unfortunately, booking within your criteria was unsuccessful at all hotels. Could you change your number of days?[NEWLINE]user: Would you try 1 night for 6 people on Sunday, please?[NEWLINE]agent: I have you booked at acorn guest house. Reference number is: IDAIIS1T.[NEWLINE]user: Brilliant! Thank you.[NEWLINE]agent: Is there anything else I can help you with today?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Find a parking garage.[NEWLINE]agent: There is 2 local parking garage's; both are 3 miles away. Palo Alto Garage has moderate traffic and Stanford Oval has no traffic. Which one do you prefer?[NEWLINE]user: Stanford Oval please.[NEWLINE]agent: Alright, Stanford Oval Parking is located at 610 Amarillo Ave[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Will it be dry in Fresno on Sunday?[NEWLINE]agent: No, on Sunday in Fresno there will be a blizzard.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Can you give me the contact info for the nearest police station?[NEWLINE]agent: Sure! The Parkside Police Station is located at Parkside, Cambridge and can be reached at 01223358966.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Hello, I'm looking for a train to get me to london kings cross.[NEWLINE]agent: Ok. Will you be departing from Cambridge?[NEWLINE]user: Yes, Cambridge and I want to leave on Sunday. I need travel time[NEWLINE]agent: Travel time is 51 minutes. What time were you hoping to leave?[NEWLINE]user: I would like to leave after 13:45.[NEWLINE]agent: There is a train that leaves at 15:00 would you like me to book that train for you?[NEWLINE]user: No thanks, I just needed the travel time for the train departing at 15:00.

user: Yes, I'd like to book three nights, for three people, at the Worth House hotel.[NEWLINE]agent: What day will you be checking in?[NEWLINE]user: I would be arriving Sunday.[NEWLINE]agent: Ok. The booking was successful. Your reference number is M15ZT8QM.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need to book a taxi to take me from Mumford Theatre to go to Darry's Cookhouse and Wine Shop.[NEWLINE]agent: Ok, what time do you want to leave?[NEWLINE]user: I need to get there by 24:45.[NEWLINE]agent: Your booking is complte, a grey lexus will pick you up. The contact number is 07486674737. Do you need any further assistance?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Could I ask for your help in finding a guesthouse to put my friends up in nearby?[NEWLINE]agent: Of course! Cambridge boasts many wonderful guesthouses. What did you have in mind?[NEWLINE]user: Some place moderately priced, with free wifi.[NEWLINE]agent: I have 14 options spread out all over town. Do you have a preference as to the area you want to stay?[NEWLINE]user: I don't have a preference. Which one looks best to you?[NEWLINE]agent: The A and B Guest House is on the east side of town and has 4 stars. Would you like me to book it for you?[NEWLINE]user: No thank you, that is all I needed. Have a great day![NEWLINE]agent: You're welcome. Please contact us if you need more information or would like to make a reservation. Have a wonderful day![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Hello, I need information on the parkside police station.[NEWLINE]agent: The phone number for Parkside Police Station is 01223358966, address Parkside, Cambridge, CB11JG.[NEWLINE]user: amazing, thanks for your help[NEWLINE]agent: Do you want me to call 911?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I would like to book a taxi from the hamilton lodge to restaurant one seven.[NEWLINE]agent: Ok, what time do you want to leave.[NEWLINE]user: I'd like to arrive by 21:30.

user: I'm looking for a cheap place to dine. I want it to be on the west side of town.[NEWLINE]agent: There are two cheap restaurants on the west side, one Italian and one Vietnamese. Do you have a preference?[NEWLINE]user: Shucks. No Polish?[NEWLINE]agent: No, sorry we have no cheap Polish restaurants in the west of town, would you like me to look in a different area or price range?[NEWLINE]user: I suppose Italian might suffice. Do you have any listings for cheap Italian restaurants on the west side?[NEWLINE]agent: I do have la margherita that meets your requests. Would you like me to book a table for you?[NEWLINE]user: no, but could you please give me the address and the phone number?[NEWLINE]agent: Certainly. La Margherita is located at 15 Magdalene Street City Centre and their phone number is 01223315232. Is there anything else I can help you with today?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Are there any places that offer rooms in the north that also give free wifi, or do you have to go to other parts of town for that?[NEWLINE]agent: which has free wifi?[NEWLINE]user: The hotel should include free wifi[NEWLINE]agent: There are twelve options fitting your description, sir. What price range are you interested in?[NEWLINE]user: The hotel should have a star of 3 and doesn't need to have free parking.[NEWLINE]agent: How about hamilton lodge? It looks lovely.[NEWLINE]user: Perfect. What's the price range and postcode?[NEWLINE]agent: It is moderately priced and the postcode is cb41da.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: When is my doctor's appointment?[NEWLINE]agent: Your doctor's appointment is Monday at 1 pm.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need a 4 star hotel on the north side.[NEWLINE]agent: I have 7 moderately priced properties in the north with 4 stars, and 1 cheap one. Do you have a preference for price?[NEWLINE]user: Is there anything in the expensive price range?[NEWLINE]agent: No, I'm sorry, there is not.[NEWLINE]user: How about just moderate?[NEWLINE]agent: Yes, there are 7 properties fitting that description and they are all guesthouses. Would you like to book one?[NEWLINE]user: Yes, which one do you suggest?[NEWLINE]agent: Avalon is my favorite. When do you want to stay?[NEWLINE]user: Can you book it for 4 people and 4 nights starting from saturday?[NEWLINE]agent: Booked! Your reference number is HWZZ651R. Is there anything else you need?[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Can you find me a gas station nearby?[NEWLINE]agent: We're 6 miles away from Chevron but there is a road block nearby[NEWLINE]user: Which one is it the quickest way to get there?

user: In mountain view, will there be frost today or tomorrow?[NEWLINE]agent: No, in Mountain View there will be clear skies today and dry tomorrow[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I need some train schedule information, please.[NEWLINE]agent: Is there a specific destination you need to depart from?[NEWLINE]user: Yes, the train should arrive by 18:15 and should depart from ely.[NEWLINE]agent: What is your destination?[NEWLINE]user: I want to go to Cambridge, please.[NEWLINE]agent: trainID departure destination day leaveAt arriveBy price duration book (optional) TR8519 ely cambridge friday 05:35 05:52 4.40 pounds 17 minutes TR8510 ely cambridge friday 07:35 07:52 4.40 pounds 17 minutes TR3976 ely cambridge friday 09:35 09:52 4.40 pounds 17 minutes TR0212 ely cambridge friday 11:35 11:52 4.40 pounds 17 minutes TR0236 ely cambridge friday 13:35 13:52 4.40 pounds 17 minutes there is a sample[NEWLINE]user: Thanks, that's all I need.[NEWLINE]agent: Did you say you were leaving on Friday?[NEWLINE]user: I need to leave on Thursday, not Friday.[NEWLINE]agent: I see. All right, I've adjusted that information for you.[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: Where is the nearest pizza place?[NEWLINE]agent: The nearest pizza place is Round Table located 4 miles away. Do you want the address?[NEWLINE]user: Yes, please, and pick the quickest route to get there too[NEWLINE]agent: 113 Anton Ct, there is no traffic and you should be able to reach there quickly[NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: I am looking for the Addenbrookes Hospital.[NEWLINE]agent: The hospital is located at Hills Rd, Cambridge in postcode CB20QQ.[NEWLINE]user: Can I have the phone number please?[NEWLINE]agent: The phone number is 01223245151. Is there anything else?[NEWLINE]user: That will be all. Thank you for your help.[NEWLINE]agent: Great! Have a nice day![NEWLINE][BOUNDARY][NEWLINE]user: what is the weather for next week[NEWLINE]agent: What city do you need weather information for?[NEWLINE]user: Will it be cloudy in Los Angeles next week?

user: Yes I am looking for an expensive restaurant in the South of town.[NEWLINE]agent: I have many.
